content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As part of our contractual relationship, EPAM is required to formally notify Ticketmaster as soon as possible of any security breaches that could impact them. Ticketmaster have an obligation to their own customers to act swiftly to protect their intellectual property and environments, and our own timing is key to supporting this.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s standard internal process can take up to 24 hours before the impacted project team is notified. From Ticketmaster’s point of view this is vital time when they could be exposed to attack or exploitation. It’s important that we establish a project-level notification procedure, for all staff and RMs working with Ticketmaster, so that we can work in partnership to protect our customer’s exposure as well as our own.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Should a security incident (or potential security incident) occur, all EPAM staff are obliged to report it immediately via \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". In some cases this may be difficult or impossible for the individual to do, and the RM should be notified so that they can do the reporting. The staff member or their RM should \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"also\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" directly notify EPAM’s Ticketmaster account team (AM, DM and Project Coordinators). The notification \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"must go to the whole account team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in case any individuals are unavailable.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
